Set the screen width to 1920 and height to 1080 with a DPI of 96.
Add a button with ID btn_2 at coordinates x=300, y=400 with dimensions 60x40.
Focus the text field with ID txt_1.
Create a window with ID window_2 titled "New Application" at the top-left corner with dimensions 600x400.
Disable the button with ID btn_1.
Copy the content of the text field with ID txt_1.
Add a label with ID label_2 and content "Password" at coordinates x=150, y=220.
Type "Hello World" into the text field with ID txt_1.
Add the button with ID btn_2 to the window with ID window_2.
Change the DPI of the screen to 72.
